description: The Consumer Discretionary Select Sector SPDR Fund seeks to provide investment results that, before expenses, correspond generally to the price and yield performance of the Consumer Discretionary Select Sector Index (the “Index”)The Index seeks to provide an effective representation of the consumer discretionary sector of the S&P 500 IndexSeeks to provide precise exposure to companies in specialty retail; broadline retail; hotels, restaurants and leisure; textiles, apparel and luxury goods; household durables; automobiles; automobile components; distributors; leisure products; and diversified consumer services.Allows investors to take strategic or tactical positions at a more targeted level than traditional style based investing
name: The Consumer Discretionary Select Sector SPDR Fund
